zeroth.framework.enterprise.app.SimpleRepositoryApplicationの使用

  • SimpleRepositoryApplicationを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    zeroth.actor.screen.iface.jsf.conversation.home
    Home conversation-scoped faces module.
    zeroth.actor.screen.iface.jsf.conversation.master
    Master conversation-scoped faces module.
    zeroth.actor.service.app.actor
    Actor service module.
    zeroth.actor.service.app.misc
    Miscellaneous service module.
    zeroth.framework.enterprise.app
    Service module.
    zeroth.framework.screen.iface.jsf
    Faces module.
